import { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react'; import { Outlet, Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon, HomeIcon, CalendarIcon, TicketIcon, ClockIcon, UserCircleIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const navigation = [ { name: 'Dashboard', href: '/', icon: HomeIcon }, { name: 'Appointments', href: '/appointments', icon: CalendarIcon }, { name: 'Tokens', href: '/tokens', icon: TicketIcon }, { name: 'Time Slots', href: '/time-slots', icon: ClockIcon }, ]; export default function Layout() { const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); return (
    • {navigation.map((item) => (
